unnormalised: Aiyyo, Adv. Sharma ya chongdongbwirangni simang bidhini gwnangwi, chacha ni bakhri joto ainni bwkhakhouri manwswrni simang manw, hakhe will ao alada hwnnwi thanggwnangwblaobw. Hakhe mainwi, beta, thanwkhwi ainni lawyer lagwn!
normalised: Aiyyo, Advocate Sharma bwikhango civil code খौ লৈগা chacha नि property खौ गासै legal heirs नि गेजेराव समान भाग खालाम जागोन, बेनो जाबायनोब्लाबो बिथांनि will आ बेलेगनो बुंगोन। बेखायनो beta, सासे lawyer खौ A-S-A-P आव रायज्लाय!
